sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: ROVIGNO a populous town of Italy, in Iſtria, with two good harbours, and quarries of fine ſtone. It is ſeated in a territory which produces excellent wine, in a peninſula on the weſtern coaſt. E. Long. 13. 53. N. Lat. 45. 14.
